plugin.name: mod_cluster
plugin.description: Monitoring and management of mod_cluster plugin.

operation.name: reset
operation.description: Move this application server out of an error state.

operation.name: refresh
operation.description: Refresh configuration for this application server.

operation.name: disableDomain
operation.description: Disables all contexts on each node within the current domain. If the current domain is null, then all nodes are stopped.

operation.name: enableDomain
operation.description: Enable all contexts on each node within the current domain. If the current domain is null, then all nodes are stopped.

operation.name: stopDomain
operation.description: Gracefully stops all contexts on each node within the current domain. If the current domain is null, then all nodes are stopped.

c:simple-property.name: p1
c:simple-property.displayName: The number of units of time for which to wait for all sessions to drain on a given node.

c:simple-property.name: p2
c:simple-property.displayName: Time unit of the timeout parameter

operation.name: pingHTTPD
operation.description: Ping httpd and determine whether each proxy is accessible and healthy. Returns the PING_RSP grouped by proxy address.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: Map of PING_RPS response, grouped by proxy.

operation.name: pingNodeByJVMRoute
operation.description: Ping a node from httpd and returns the PING_RSP grouped by proxy address. Dtermines whether the node configured with the specified jvm route is accessible from each proxy returning the PING_RSP grouped by proxy address.

c:simple-property.name: p1
c:simple-property.displayName: JVM Route of node to ping.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: Map of PING_RPS response, grouped by proxy.

operation.name: pingNodeByAddress
operation.description: Ping a node from httpd and returns the PING_RSP grouped by proxy address. Determines whether the node configured with the specified jvm route is accessible from each proxy returning the PING_RSP grouped by proxy address.

c:simple-property.name: p2
c:simple-property.displayName: Name or ip address of a node.

c:simple-property.name: operationResult
c:simple-property.description: Map of PING_RPS response, grouped by proxy.

operation.name: addProxy
operation.description: Add a proxy.

operation.name: removeProxy
operation.description: Remove a proxy.

operation.name: disable
operation.description: Disable all webapps for all virtual hosts of this application server.

operation.name: enable
operation.description: Enable all webapps for all virtual hosts of this application server.

operation.name: stop
operation.description: Gracefully stops all webapps for all virtual hosts of this application server.

c:simple-property.name: p2
c:simple-property.displayName: Time unit of the timeout parameter

c:simple-property.name: masterPerLoadBalancingGroup
c:simple-property.description: Enable current node to be master in the load balancing group.

c:simple-property.name: advertiseGroupAddress
c:simple-property.description: Multicast address on which to listen for advertisements.

c:simple-property.name: proxyList
c:simple-property.description: Comma separated list of address:port listing the httpd servers where mod_cluster is running.

c:simple-property.name: proxyURL
c:simple-property.description: URL prefix to send with commands to mod_cluster. Default is no prefix.

c:simple-property.name: socketTimeout
c:simple-property.description: Connection timeout for communication with the proxy.

c:simple-property.name: excludedContexts
c:simple-property.description: Comma delimited list of contexts that should *not* be auto-registered with httpd. Contexts may be qualified by host using a colon, e.g. host1:context1. If no host is defined, localhost is assumed.

c:simple-property.name: autoEnableContexts
c:simple-property.description: Toggle for context auto-enable during mod_cluster startup.

c:simple-property.name: flushWait
c:simple-property.description: Time in ms to wait before flushing packets.

c:simple-property.name: ping
c:simple-property.description: Time in s to wait for a pong answer to a ping.

c:simple-property.name: smax
c:simple-property.description: Maximum time on seconds for idle connections above smax.

c:simple-property.name: stickySession
c:simple-property.description: Enables sticky session for the node.

c:simple-property.name: stickySessionRemove
c:simple-property.description: Remove session when the request cannot be routed to the right node for this cluster.

c:simple-property.name: stickySessionForce
c:simple-property.description: Return an error when the request cannot be routed to the right node.

c:simple-property.name: workerTimeout
c:simple-property.description: Timeout to wait for an available worker (default is no wait).

c:simple-property.name: maxAttempts
c:simple-property.description: Maximum number of attempts to send the request to the backend server.

c:simple-property.name: ssl
c:simple-property.description: Whether to use SSL to communicate with mod_cluster. Note this has nothing to do with handling of https requests by JBoss Web
